module.name: edge_shape_feature
module.keywords: module, edge shape, bevel edge, step edge, radius edge, parameter, electrical, electronic, layered electronic product, feature

abstract.p: the representation of the information needed to describe certain explicitly modeled parametrically defined geometric feature definitions. These feature definitions are supported by a classification identification of the side of the interconnect substrate acting as a datum.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe certain explicitly modeled parametrically defined geometric feature definitions.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Characteristic, ISO/TS 10303-1654;
items within the scope of application module Layered 2d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1693.
